name: tti-polyfill
description: Polyfill for Time to Interactive. See https://goo.gl/OSmrPk

scripts.generate_polyfill: mkdir -p gen && babili polyfillInit.js FirstConsistentlyInteractiveCore.js activityTrackerUtils.js FirstConsistentlyInteractiveDetector.js main.js > gen/ttci.js
scripts.generate_userscript: npm run generate_polyfill && cat userscriptBeginning.js.txt gen/ttci.js userscriptEnding.js.txt > gen/TTI-Polyfill-UserScript.js

author: Deepanjan Roy (Google)
